input: goal: clamp [SEP] solution 1holds down wires easily. [SEP] solution 2holds down hair easily.

goal: How to put grip tape on a bat. [SEP] solution 1Pick out your desired grip tape color at a sporting goods store. Once you have your colored grip tape, start at the bottom and wrap it around the bat moving upward until you have your desired height and thickness. [SEP] solution 2Pick out your desired grip tape color at the home goods store. Once you have your desired color, start at the top and wrap it around the bat working downwards until you have your desired height and thickness.
goal: To prevent a light leak in a homemade camera, you can [SEP] solution 1Paint the insides black [SEP] solution 2Paint the insides white
goal: To apply resin to a journal cover. [SEP] solution 1Use a toothpick to spread the resin. [SEP] solution 2Use a flat stick to spread the resin.
goal: Make a knit pillow. [SEP] solution 1Sew two t-shirts together. [SEP] solution 2Sew two knit sweaters together.
goal: how do you pick at something? [SEP] solution 1touch it with only two fingers. [SEP] solution 2touch it with your whole hand.
goal: how do you strangle someone? [SEP] solution 1hold them by their stomach [SEP] solution 2choke them by their neck.

goal: How to remove hairs from a carpet. [SEP] solution 1Run a iron over the carpet. This will gather all the hair up and then you can just toss it into the trash. [SEP] solution 2Run a squeegee over the carpet. This will gather all the hair up and then you can just toss it into the trash.

goal: how to clean rubber [SEP] solution 1Make a cleaning solution with dish soap and water.Use a dampened cloth to wipe the surface.Allow the rubber to air dry. Rinse remaining solution from the rubber.Allow the rubber to air dry. [SEP] solution 2Make a cleaning solution with dish soap and water.Use a dampened cloth to wipe the surface.Allow the rubber to air wash in the dishwasher. Rinse remaining solution from the rubber.Allow the rubber to air dry.

goal: How can I neatly keep my laundry soap? [SEP] solution 1Use a large container that was used for huge water dispensers, set detergent in that and open and close the dispenser on that. [SEP] solution 2Use a large container that was used for huge oil drums, set detergent in that and open and close the dispenser on that.
goal: box cutter [SEP] solution 1can straighten a paperclip into a straight line [SEP] solution 2can straighten a screws into a straight line
goal: paper [SEP] solution 1can cover a towel and hide it. [SEP] solution 2can cover a drill and hide it.
goal: To secure the knot, [SEP] solution 1Place hot glue over the knot and let dry [SEP] solution 2Place a small drop of hot glue on top of the knot and let dry

goal: To start the paracord braid, [SEP] solution 1Measure out 6' of paracord, roll it up, and measure out another 6' of cord and roll up that. [SEP] solution 2Measure out 6' of paracord, cut it, and measure out another 6' of cord and cut that.
goal: Light up tiny candle wicks. [SEP] solution 1Use cooked noodle to light candle. [SEP] solution 2Use raw noodle stick to light candle.
goal: how do you make anti depressants work? [SEP] solution 1take them rectally. [SEP] solution 2take them orally.
